title:
Do you know if any DNA was collected in the murder of Officer Nunnally several years ago?  I\'m saddened that they have never found out who killed him, and I just wondered if everything has been revisited for clues in his case.



Thank you.
text:
Since that MyReporter answer was written, reporter Veronica Gonzalez
has written stories that update the case. Here are summaries and links
to those stories:



Cold Case: Murdered cop left behind plenty of fond memories



James NunaleeÍs only memories of his father are climbing on his back
pretending to ride a horse and sitting on his lap in the patrol car
playing with the sirens. He also remembers waking up in the middle of
the night. His mom going to the front... Published March 29, 2009
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20090329/ARTICLES/903299971

Cold Case: Names of cop's killers no longer a secret



Wilmington police officer James William Nunalee was shot 21 times
with a semi-automatic rifle outside a convenience store in 1978,
leaving behind a wife and 2-year-old son. Published March 29, 2009
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20090329/ARTICLES/903299975

Cold Case: Wilmington cop's killers weren't free for long



Wilmington police officer James William NunaleeÍs killers may have
gotten away with his murder, but not for long. Nunalee was shot to
death beside his patrol car outside a 7-Eleven convenience store on
April 4, 1978. His masked killers had come to... Published March 29,
2009
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20090329/ARTICLES/903299973
